QxtDockWidget Class Reference
[QxtGui module]

An extended QDockWidget that remembers its size. More... 

 #include <QxtDockWidget>

Inherits QDockWidget.

  • List of all members, including inherited members

Public Functions

  • explicit QxtDockWidget ( const QString & title , QWidget * parent = 0 , Qt::WindowFlags flags = 0 )
  • explicit QxtDockWidget ( QWidget * parent = 0 , Qt::WindowFlags flags = 0 )
  • virtual ~QxtDockWidget ( )

Detailed Description

QxtDockWidget fills in the gap in QDockWidget and makes the dock widget to remember its size while toggling visibility off and on.

Note: 146752 - QDockWidget should remember its size when hidden/shown.
http://www.trolltech.com/developer/task-tracker/index_html?method=entry&id=146752
